/*
 * CC22-ALK1105.cpp
 *
 *  Created on: 14-Apr-2012
 *      Author: Rishi
 *  Divisor Sum
 */
#include <iostream>

int main () {
	unsigned long long N;
	std::cin>>N;
	unsigned long long total_divisor_sum =0;
	for (unsigned long i =1; i<=N; i++) {
		total_divisor_sum+= (N-(N%i));
	}
	std::cout<<total_divisor_sum<<std::endl;
	return 0;
}
